description: aEnrich a+HRD has insufficient user input validation for specific API parameter. An unauthenticated remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability to inject arbitrary SQL commands to access, modify and delete database. CVE project by @Sn0wAlice

name: CVE-2022-39046
description: An issue was discovered in the GNU C Library (glibc) 2.36. When the syslog function is passed a crafted input string larger than 1024 bytes, it reads uninitialized memory from the heap and prints it to the target log file, potentially revealing a portion of the contents of the heap. CVE project by @Sn0wAlice
